mapper.select:
select au.id,au.use_code,au.asset_codes,au.use_user,au.use_time, au.remark,au.create_user,au.create_time,au.create_way, au.update_user,au.update_time,au.status from asset_use au
au.use_del = '0'
and au.use_code like concat('%',#{useCode},'%')
and au.use_user like concat('%',#{useUser},'%')
and au.status = #{status}
and au.create_way = #{createWay}
and date_format(a.use_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginUseTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.use_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endUseTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginCreateTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endCreateTime},'%y%m%d')
select au.id,au.use_code,au.use_user,au.use_time, au.remark,au.asset_codes,au.status from asset_use au where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into asset_use ( use_code, asset_codes, use_user, use_time, remark, create_user, create_time, create_way, update_user, status, update_time ) values ( #{useCode}, #{assetCodes}, #{useUser}, #{useTime}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{createWay}, #{updateUser}, #{status}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update asset_use set use_del = '1' where id = #{id}
